text

public static TextSchemaItem text(String name,
                                  int minOccurs,
                                  int maxOccurs,
                                  boolean stored,
                                  boolean indexed,
                                  boolean tokenized,
                                  boolean norms,
                                  boolean vectors,
                                  boolean positions,
                                  boolean offsets)
Creates a textual schema item.

Parameters:
name - Field name.
minOccurs - Minimum number of occurrences.
maxOccurs - Maximum number of occurrences.
stored - Whether the field is stored.
indexed - Whether the field is indexed.
tokenized - Whether the field is tokenized.
norms - Whether norms are stored.
vectors - Whether term vectors are stored.
positions - Whether term vectors are stored with positions (ignored if vectors is false).
offsets - Whether term vectors are stored with offsets (ignored if vectors is false).

offsets - Whether term vectors are stored with offsets (ignored if vectors is false).

id

public static TextSchemaItem id(String name,
                                int minOccurs,
                                int maxOccurs,
                                boolean stored,
                                boolean indexed)
Creates an id textual schema item. Ids are not tokenized, and have no norms and no vectors.

Parameters:
name - Field name.
minOccurs - Minimum number of occurrences.
maxOccurs - Maximum number of occurrences.
stored - Whether the field is stored.
indexed - Whether the field is indexed.

id

public static TextSchemaItem id(String name,
                                int minOccurs,
                                boolean stored,
                                boolean indexed)
Creates an id textual schema item with an unbounded number of occurrences. Ids are not tokenized, and have no norms and no vectors.

Parameters:
name - Field name.
minOccurs - Minimum number of occurrences.
stored - Whether the field is stored.
indexed - Whether the field is indexed.

id

public static TextSchemaItem id(String name,
                                boolean stored,
                                boolean indexed)
Creates an id textual schema item with any of occurrences. Ids are not tokenized, and have no norms and no vectors.

Parameters:
name - Field name.
stored - Whether the field is stored.
indexed - Whether the field is indexed.

                                boolean stored,
